description: The API Schema for AWS Route53 Recovery Readiness Cells.

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

CellName.description: The name of the cell to create.
CellName.markdownDescription:
The name of the cell to create.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9_]+  
Update requires: Replacement

Cells.description: A list of cell Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) contained within this cell, for use in nested cells. For example, Availability Zones within specific Regions.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Cells.markdownDescription:
A list of cell Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) contained within this cell, for use in nested cells. For example, Availability Zones within specific Regions.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: A collection of tags associated with a resource
Tags.markdownDescription:
A collection of tags associated with a resource

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

CellArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cell.
CellArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cell.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

ParentReadinessScopes.description: The readiness scope for the cell, which can be a cell Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or a recovery group ARN. This is a list but currently can have only one element.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

ParentReadinessScopes.markdownDescription:
The readiness scope for the cell, which can be a cell Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or a recovery group ARN. This is a list but currently can have only one element.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption
